title: Can't rename runepage to support
body: Apparently if you change your runepage title to "support" it censors it to ******

replies.body: Sooooooo funny little story. We recently updated some of the mature language filters, and as it turns out, something went a little wrong and those filters are bleeding into the runepages for SOME strange reason. We've got people looking into it, but I don't really have any kind of ETA on a fix quite yet =\ .

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dpnbkBgO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-06T21:27:11.397+0000)
>
> Sooooooo funny little story. We recently updated some of the mature language filters, and as it turns out, something went a little wrong and those filters are bleeding into the runepages for SOME strange reason. We've got people looking into it, but I don't really have any kind of ETA on a fix quite yet =\ .

Still doesn't explain why support is considered a curse word.
